cast.overview: Lorelei Lee is a beautiful showgirl engaged to be married to the wealthy Gus Esmond, much to the disapproval of Gus' rich father, Esmond Sr., who thinks that Lorelei is just after his money. When Lorelei goes on a cruise accompanied only by her best friend, Dorothy Shaw, Esmond Sr. hires Ernie Malone, a private detective, to follow her and report any questionable behavior that would disqualify her from the marriage.
cast.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes

details.biography: Ralph Peters was born on August 3, 1902 in Leavenworth, Kansas, USA. He was an actor, known for Ball of Fire (1941), Black Magic (1944) and While the City Sleeps (1956). He died on April 12, 1959 in Hollywood, California, USA.
details.name: Ralph Peters
